synopsis.text: Suzuki-loving Rin, thug-wannabe Hijiri, and pro-racer Chisame join forces with Hane Sakura, a high school student with a newfound passion for motorcycles. After a chance encounter with the motorcycle-riding Onsa Amano, Sakura decides to join the motorcycle club at her all-girls school, led by the enigmatic Raimu Kawasaki. Faced with the challenges of learning to ride, securing a faculty sponsor, and earning her license, Sakura embarks on a thrilling journey filled with laughter, camaraderie, and the freedom of the open road. Join this diverse group of girls as they navigate the ups and downs of motorcycle club life, united by their love for two wheels.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
